Got this working flawlessly. PAL 4.2E with USB Loader GX. "Forced 50PAL" activated, and "Error 002 fix" on, and that's about it. Don't know if "Error 002 fix" really is needed, but it hasn't caused any trouble either.

I am using this on a PAL system loading from DVD :) !
Thanks uploader, yes it works guys! i am so happy, my wii wasn't even hacked yesterday, now it is I can play downloaded games!! 
First you have to hack you wii.
Go to http://www.wiihacks.com/recommended-faqs-guides-tutorials-only/
Follow the step by step guide for YOUR wii version. eg mine was 4.2, yours may be 3/4.1 etc.

Once you have done (and installed Neogamma(to load from DVD drive, or USB Loader GX(HDD/USB), you can play from DVD or USB/HDD. I'm loading from DVD on a PAL system(awesome)

and once it is hacked look at this guide:
http://www.wiihacks.com/wii-games/59089-guide-super-mario-galaxy-2-a.html


Note! I didn't even need IOS56 that is mentioned on the game guide.

So basically, it is not too hard, this game does work, and it even runs on PAL from DVD (simply Unrar the file,. burn the ISO as slowly as possible to a DVD-R disc with imgburn(i used imation).

if u have a question ill try answer it,

thanks Markuf,
